messages.title: A stronger economy
messages.content: Every child born today has £25,000 of national debt. Labour doubled the debt to £1 trillion. Only Shaun and the Conservatives have a plan to halve the deficit and stop wasting money on debt interest. Sound public finances mean better schools and hospitals for you and your children.

messages.title: Giving children the skills they need to succeed
messages.content: A focus on a level results has led to a technical skills gap. We need to revive the old technical diplomas to get our kids ready for work.

messages.title: Better housing and the ladder up
messages.content: It's the fourth most expensive place in the world to buy a property. We need to build family homes in London not just high cost micro flats. That's why Shaun is working in the community to identify sites for new family homes that are affordable.

messages.title: Our Local NHS
messages.content: Out local NHS is a lifeline – at Hammersmith and Charing Cross. Shaun Bailey is working closely with Chad at Charing Cross to improve healthcare services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Shaun Bailey discusses local crime and street safety with Shepherd Bush residents. CCTV cuts crime. Shaun has got more CCTV for the White City Estates residents and he'll get more. We've got to make it easy to gather evidence and put crooks in jail. That's where your police can spend all the time on the street.

Labour doubled the debt to £1 trillion. Only Shaun and the Conservatives have a plan to halve the deficit and stop wasting money on debt interest. Sound public finances mean better schools and hospitals for you and your children.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better Housing and the Ladder Up
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Identifying community sites for new family homes that are adequate, affordable and available.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving Children the Skills They Need to Succeed
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reviving the technical diplomas to prepare kids for work and address the technical skills gap.
Against the planned third runway at Heathrow - every 90 seconds, a jumbo jet over people's home is too much noise. Shaun Bailey and the Conservatives will stop it.
Giving local people a greater say in local matters, against the top-down, government-knows-best approach.
Working closely with Charing Cross to improve healthcare services.

issues.economy: Labour doubled the debt to £1 trillion. Only Shaun and the Conservatives have a plan to halve the deficit and stop wasting money on debt interest. Sound public finances mean better schools and hospitals for you and your children.
issues.education: A focus on a level results has led to a technical skills gap. We need to revive the old technical diplomas to get our kids ready for work.
issues.health: Out local NHS is a lifeline – at Hammersmith and Charing Cross. Shaun Bailey is working closely with Chad at Charing Cross to improve healthcare services.

housing.content: It's the fourth most expensive place in the world to buy a property. We need to build family homes in London not just high cost micro flats. That's why Shaun is working in the community to identify sites for new family homes that are affordable.

leaflet.personalStatement: With a General Election around the corner, you have an important choice to make. Only my action has the experience to fight for our area and the people who live here. My best to show that I am open, honest and straight talking about the important issues we face as a country and as a family. We urgently need better community far-sight out politics. I believe I am the person to help drive this change and have the backing, the passion and experience to make it happen.

images.caption: Shaun Bailey running to be your new MP for Hammersmith and Shepherds Bush
